snippet: In the latest installment in The Agenda series: Responding to questions about science, Mitt Romney says he believes the world is getting warmer and "humans play a role in that warming."
abstract: In the latest installment in The Agenda series: Responding to questions about science, Mitt Romney says he believes the world is getting warmer and "humans play a role in that warming."

headline.main: The Agenda: Shifting Views on Climate Change
